name: Cuisinart Ice Cream Maker Machine, 1.5 Quart Double Insulated Machine, Sorbet and Frozen Yogurt Maker, Ready in 20 Minutes, ICE-21P1, White
short_description: SUPERIOR FUNCTION: This Cuisinart Ice Cream Maker Machine features a mixing paddle that makes frozen treats in 20 minutes or less. COOL FEATURE: Double-insulated freezer bowl eliminates the need for ice. CAPACITY: This ice cream maker can produce up to 1-1/2 quarts of your favorite ice cream or frozen yogurt. EASY TO USE: Ice cream machine features an easy-lock transparent lid with large spout to make adding ingredients simple and mess free. LIMITED 3-YEAR WARRANTY: The BPA-free Cuisinart Ice Cream Maker Machine comes with a limited 3-year warranty.
product_description: Create your favorite frozen treats quickly and easily with the Cuisinart Ice Cream Maker Machine. Featuring a mixing paddle, this ice cream maker churns out tasty ice cream, sorbet, or frozen yogurt in 20 minutes or less. It has a double-insulated freezer bowl that eliminates the need for ice, making cleanup quick and easy. With this Cuisinart Ice Cream Maker Machine that has a generous capacity of up to 1-1/2 quarts, you can make plenty of frozen treats. The easy-lock transparent lid with a large spout ensures adding ingredients is mess-free.

name: DASH My Mug Ice Cream Maker Machine (Aqua): Multi-Purpose Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine with (2) Bowls for Homemade Gelato, Sorbet, Frozen Yogurt, Built-In Ingredient Chute, Easy to Clean and Store
short_description: VERSATILE ICE CREAM MACHINE: The DASH My Mug Ice Cream Maker creates delicious single servings of ice cream, gelato, sorbet, and frozen yogurt. Freeze the base for 24 hours, add ingredients, and press the on button for a delectable snack in just 20 minutes. PERSONALIZED TREATS: This soft serve machine allows personalization of recipes. Mix in your favorite add-ins using the built-in ingredient chute, creating a unique homemade ice cream experience at home. INNOVATIVE DESIGN: This DASH Mug Ice Cream Maker doubles as a freezable mug, allowing you to enjoy your homemade frozen treats straight from the source, increasing the convenience of this frozen yogurt machine. CONVENIENT AND SPACE-SAVING: The frozen dessert maker serves as a convenient and small ice cream machine. All accessories detach and store neatly inside the mug, perfect for kitchens with limited space. INCLUDES: One DASH My Mug Ice Cream Maker with (2) Bowls, Recipe Guide, and Instruction Manual

name: Elite Gourmet Maxi-Matic EIM-924L 4 quart Old Fashioned Electric Ice Cream Maker, Pine Bucket
short_description: 4-QUART CAPACITY: Freeze up to 4 Quarts of cold and creamy ice cream, gelato, frozen yogurt or sorbet. Perfect for party time, snack time, barbeques, picnics and big events - enough to feed everyone! WATER PROOF LINED INTERIOR: Hand-crafted solid pine wooden bucket with a solid plastic liner. No more leaks or damage to the wood when in operation. EASY 3 STEP PROCESS: 1) Mix your favorite ingredients and place in canister, 2) assemble the unit and add ice + rock salt, 3) plug in and turn On. NO MANUAL EFFORT NEEDED: A powerful electric motor-driven paddle does all the churning to whip to a creamy consistency in minutes, no more intensive stirring or manual effort required. WHISPER QUIET OPERATION: The electric motor conveniently locks onto the liner, making sure all parts are interlocked for safe and quiet operation.
product_description: Elite Gourmet EIM-924L 4 Qt. Electric Motorized Maker Ice & Rock Salt, 4Qt. Freezing Canister, Creamy Ice Cream, Gelato, Frozen Yogurt, or Sorbet, Recipe Booklet, 4 Quart, Pine

name: Nostalgia Electric Ice Cream Maker - Old Fashioned Soft Serve Ice Cream Machine Makes Frozen Yogurt or Gelato in Minutes - Fun Kitchen Appliance - Vintage Wooden Style - Dark Wood - 6 Quart
short_description: HOMEMADE ICE CREAM: Enjoy a fun ice cream experience with modern convenience with our ice cream machines. Make ice cream, frozen yogurt, or gelato, or choose your favorite flavor and make a unique and delicious creation. NOSTALGIA ICE CREAM KITS: Our ice cream machines for home pair perfectly with all Nostalgia ice cream kits. Try the vanilla crème, chocolate, and strawberry ice cream mix or the premium starter kit, which is excellent for a party or snack time. QUICK AND EASY: Make homemade ice cream in 20 minutes. The powerful electric motor does all the churning and work for you. There is no more intensive stirring or manual effort, and the motor locks into place to keep all parts secure. CONVENIENT HANDLE: Take the gelato maker to parties or the neighbor's house. It has a carrying handle attached to the bucket, making it easy to move no matter where it needs to go. NOSTALGIA: From designs inspired by early 20th century America to the timeless appeal of our appliances, we offer unique, novel, and fun products for the family. We preserve the past, embrace the present, and look forward to the future.
product_description: Gather the whole family and enjoy a fun-filled ice cream-making experience with Nostalgia's Electric Ice Cream Maker. You can make ice cream, sorbet, and gelato whenever and wherever you want. Add your ingredients into the aluminum canister, place in the middle of the bucket, layer with ice and salt, and let the electric motor do the rest. Customize each recipe by adding extras, like strawberry preserves, cookie dough, candy, and cookie pieces. When you're all done, use the included lid and cap to store leftover ice cream in the freezer.

name: Ice Cream Maker Machine – Premium Electric Maker Machine with Low-Noise Operation, Rechargeable,Perfect for Gelato, Sorbet & Frozen Yogurt, Easy to Clean,Silver
short_description: [Homemade Ice Cream in Minutes]BRIOBITE's ice cream maker lets you enjoy homemade soft serve ice cream,sorbet,and frozen drinks in as little as 20-30 minutes. Pre-freeze the bowl for more than 12 hours,and your favorite frozen treats will be ready in no time—no need to wait all day [Compact & Portable Design]This electric soft serve ice cream maker fits easily into your bag,so you can take it with you anywhere. It makes 1-2 servings at a time,which is perfect for families or couples. Ideal for any ice cream lover, it's also a great gift idea [Quiet&Powerful]Our soft serve ice cream maker runs quietly with low-noise technology. Simply press the button to activate its ultra-silent,powerful motor,and you'll have rich, creamy ice cream in just 20-30 minutes—without disturbing noise [USB-C Charging & Rechargeable]Featuring a USB-C charging port and a built-in 2600mAh lithium battery, this soft serve ice cream maker can be used at least three times on a single charge. You can use it while charging if the battery runs low,offering complete convenience [Simple to Operate & Clean] Using the soft serve ice cream maker is easy with its user-friendly control panel and built-in timer. Add your ingredients, set the timer, and let it work its magic. The unit is easy to clean too—just disassemble and rinse with water

name: Dash Deluxe Gelato & Ice Cream Maker, 2qt - cream
short_description: Makes up to two quarts of ice cream, sorbet, frozen yogurt, and more. Make your favorite flavors in big batches—great for families and entertaining Cooling Bowl is double insulated to keep things chill Churn with just one touch and add mix-ins through Ingredient Chute for customized ice cream Go dairy-free & use better-for-you ingredients—recipes included! Includes: Dash 2QT Ice Cream Maker and Recipe Guide
product_description: When they all scream for ice cream, your kitchen can become the coolest ice cream parlor in town with the Dash Deluxe Ice Cream Maker! Easily churn up two quarts of ice cream at once, big batches that are perfect for parties and family gatherings. Start your frosty adventure by freezing the double-insulated Cooling Bowl for 24-48 hours. Then, chill ingredients for your favorite flavor and start churning with one touch. Mid-churn, use the Ingredient Chute to toss in whatever your sweet tooth is calling for––decadent chocolate chips, cookie crumbles, nuts, and even swirls of caramel. Craving a firmer texture or want to save some scoops for later? Just pop your ice cream into the freezer to achieve the perfect consistency. Use our included Recipe Guide to go dairy-free or make healthier versions of your favorite frozen treats. From frozen yogurt to sorbet, ice cream to gelato, everyone can have the ice cream of their dreams!

name: Elite Gourmet 4Qt Electric Ice Cream Maker EIM350 Delicious Homemade Ice Cream, Gelato, Sorbet, Frozen Yogurt, 4Qt Aluminum Freezing Cannister, Durable Plastic Ice Bucket, Powerful 50W, Periwinkle
short_description: 4-QUART CAPACITY: Make up to 4 Quarts of fresh and creamy ice cream, gelato, frozen yogurt or sorbet. Perfect for party time, snack time, barbeques, picnics and big events – it makes enough frosty treats to feed everyone! FUN, REFRESHING & PORTABLE: It’s always Summertime with Elite Gourmet’s newest Ice Cream Maker. It’s compact so you can take it anywhere, anytime to enjoy delicious frosty treats with family & friends. EFFORTLESS ENJOYMENT: Using the Elite Gourmet Ice Maker is a breeze. Simply place prepared ice cream mix into the aluminum freezing cannister and place into the ice bucket, install the electric motor, then add ice & salt, plug in & turn On. Perfect, fluffy ice cream and other delicious treats will be ready to serve in no time! Add your favorite condiments and indulge in a cold, fresh & frosty treat! POWERFUL SMOOTH OPERATION: The 50-watt motor provides plenty of power to effortlessly churn fresh ice cream, frozen yogurt and other delicious, frosty treats. EASY TO CLEAN Simple to disassemble, hand wash, reassemble and store for future use.
product_description: The New Elite Gourmet 4 Qt. Electric Ice Cream Maker churns out delicious homemade, frozen treats quickly and to your specifications. It features a 4-quart heavy duty aluminum canister, durable ice bucket and a powerful 50-watt motor, so making ice cream, sorbet, gelato & frozen yogurt is fast, convenient and fun for the whole family! It’s always summer when you can entertain at parties, BBQ’s and picnics using all your favorite ice cream, sorbet, gelato and frozen yogurt recipes. The motor effortlessly churns the mixing paddle that whips air into the ingredients producing smooth, rich & delicious ice cream & other treats. Adding crushed cookies, fruit, chocolate chips or a variety of other yummy treats is easy since the mixing paddle thoroughly integrates them into the ice cream mixture. The durable plastic bucket holds ice and rock salt for brining & keeping the canister at optimal freezing temperature. The ice cream maker parts are simple to disassemble for easy cleaning and reassemble for storage.

name: Elite Gourmet EIM916 Old Fashioned 6 Quart Vintage Wood Bucket Electric Ice Cream Maker Machine Appalachian, Bonus Classic Die-Cast Hand Crank for Churning, Uses Ice and Rock Salt
short_description: 6-QUART CAPACITY: Freeze up to 6 Quarts of cold and creamy ice cream, gelato, frozen yogurt or sorbet. Perfect for party time, snack time, barbeques, picnics and big events - enough to feed everyone! EASY 3 STEP PROCESS: 1) Mix your favorite ingredients and place in canister, 2) assemble the unit and add ice + rock salt, 3) plug in and turn On. QUICK & EASY TO USE: The ice cream and dessert maker is simple to use. Simply add the ingredient mixture into the machine, use the automatic motor or manual hand-crank and you'll have a tasty dessert in a short time just like the old-fashioned way. WHISPER QUIET OPERATION: The electric motor conveniently locks onto the bucket, making sure all parts are interlocked for safe and quiet operation. CLEANUP IS EASY: The aluminum canister allows for easy wiping away of messes, cleanup afterwards is a cinch. Easily store leftover ice cream in your freezer, plus included is a see-thru lid that fits right on top of the ice cream canister. Dishwasher safe canister and lid.
product_description: The Elite Gourmet 6Qt. Old Fashioned Electric Ice Cream Maker churns out delicious homemade ice cream in just minutes. It features a 6-quart heavy duty aluminum canister and a powerful 90-rpm motor, so making ice cream is fast, convenient and fun for the whole family! It’s great for entertaining at family parties, BBQ’s and picnics using all of your favorite ice cream, sorbet, gelato and even frozen yogurt recipes. The motor turns a six-fin paddle that whips air into the ingredients producing a smooth, rich soft serve ice cream. The paddle quickly crushes cookies, fruit, chocolate chips or a variety of other yummy toppings and thoroughly integrates them into the mixture. The old-fashioned Appalachian wood bucket holds ice and rock salt, keeping the canister at the optimal 10°F temperature. All parts conveniently remove for easy cleaning.
